Contents

* [Class Skills](#class_skills)
* [Class Features](#class_features)
  + [Weapon and Armor Proficiency](#weapon_and_armor_proficiency)
  + [Spells per Day](#spells_per_day)
  + [Enhance Arrows (Su)](#enhance_arrows_su)
  + [Imbue Arrow (Su)](#imbue_arrow_su)
  + [Seeker Arrow (Su)](#seeker_arrow_su)

sections.title: Arcane Archer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Arcane Archer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, light armor, medium armor, and shields.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Advances spellcasting progression from a previous arcane spellcasting class, gaining spells per day and caster level but no other class features.

sections.title: Enhance Arrows (Su) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Makes nonmagical arrows magical with enhancement bonuses and special weapon properties that scale with level, including elemental, distance, burst, and alignment qualities.

sections.title: Imbue Arrow ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Allows casting area spells through arrows, centering the spell's area where the arrow lands regardless of the spell's normal range or targeting restrictions.

sections.title: Seeker Arrow ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Fires arrows that travel around corners to known targets within range, negating cover and concealment modifiers with limited daily uses.

sections.title: Phase Arrow ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Shoots arrows that pass through nonmagical barriers in straight lines, negating cover, concealment, armor, and shield modifiers with limited daily uses.

sections.title: Hail of Arrows ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Fires one arrow at every target within range using primary attack bonus, with a maximum number of targets equal to arcane archer level.

sections.title: Arrow of Death ([Su](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Supernatural-Abilities-Su-)) (Arcane Archer)
sections.description: Creates a special slaying arrow that forces damaged targets to make a Fortitude save or die instantly, with specific crafting time and duration limits.
